title: hauz-khas-social
name: Hauz Khas Social
shortDescription: Hauz Khas Social is a cafe that offers more than just food and drinks. It is a place where you can work, collaborate, network, and socialize with like-minded people in a creative and inspiring environment.
description: Hauz Khas Social is a cafe that offers more than just food and drinks. It is a place where you can work, collaborate, network, and socialize with like-minded people in a creative and inspiring environment. Located in the cultural hub of Delhi, Hauz Khas Village, the cafe boasts a stunning view of the Hauz Khas lake and the historical monument. The cafe has a unique design that blends rustic and industrial elements with recycled and upcycled furniture. The cafe has a spacious and airy feel, with large windows, high ceilings, and exposed brick walls. The cafe also has a rooftop terrace, where you can enjoy the breeze and the scenery.

Hauz Khas Social serves a variety of cuisines, from North Indian, Chinese, and Biryani, to Pasta, Burger, and Pizza. The cafe also has a full bar, where you can sip on cocktails, mocktails, beers, and wines. The cafe is famous for its all-day breakfast, which includes dishes like the Social Shake, the Breakfast Tray, and the Taco Soup. The cafe also has some signature dishes, such as the Grilled Chicken Peri Peri Sizzler, the Chicken Shwarma Platter, and the Jalapeno Cheese Nads. The cafe also caters to different dietary preferences, such as vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free.

Hauz Khas Social is not just a cafe, but also a co-working space, where you can rent a desk, a meeting room, or a private cabin. The cafe provides high-speed internet, power outlets, stationery, and printing facilities. The cafe also hosts various events, such as workshops, seminars, art exhibitions, live music, comedy shows, and DJ nights. The cafe is a hub for artists, entrepreneurs, freelancers, and innovators, who come here to share their ideas, skills, and passions.

Hauz Khas Social is open from 12 noon to 1 am, and you can make a reservation online or by phone. The cafe has a friendly and helpful staff, who will make you feel welcome and comfortable. The cafe has a casual dress code, and a couple entry only policy. The cafe is also LGBTQIA friendly, and supports social causes. The cafe has a vibrant and lively atmosphere, where you can have fun, relax, and connect with others.

Hauz Khas Social is a cafe that combines work and play, culture and cuisine, and history and modernity. It is a place where you can experience the best of Delhi, and be part of a community of social and creative people. Hauz Khas Social is more than just a cafe, it is a way of life.

title: raasta
name: Raasta
shortDescription: Cafe Raasta is a Caribbean-themed restaurant that offers a fusion of delectable food, exceptional drinks, and an immersive musical experience.
description: Cafe Raasta is a Caribbean-themed restaurant that offers a fusion of delectable food, exceptional drinks, and an immersive musical experience. The cafe is inspired by the Rastafari culture and the reggae music genre, which originated in Jamaica and spread across the world. The cafe’s decor reflects the vibrant colors, patterns, and symbols of the Caribbean islands, such as the red, green, and yellow of the Rastafari flag, the dreadlocks, the lion, and the cannabis leaf. The cafe also features swing chairs, hammocks, and bean bags for a relaxed and cozy ambiance.

The menu at cafe Raasta is a mix of cuisines from different parts of the world, such as North Indian, Italian, Chinese, Asian, Continental, Pizza, and Fast Food. The cafe also serves a variety of beverages, such as mocktails, smoothies, shakes, teas, and coffees. Some of the popular dishes at cafe Raasta are the creamy mushroom penne, the garden burger, the snicker shake, the darjeeling tea, the corn bhel, and the crispy fried chicken1. The cafe also offers a brunch menu that includes pancakes, waffles, sandwiches, salads, and more

Cafe Raasta is not just a place to eat and drink, but also a place to enjoy live music and entertainment. The cafe hosts live DJ nights, karaoke sessions, and live bands that play reggae, rock, pop, and other genres of music. The cafe also has a rooftop seating area that offers a panoramic view of the city skyline and a romantic setting for couples. The cafe is open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, making it a perfect destination for late-night hangouts, parties, and celebrations

Cafe Raasta is a place where you can taste the islands in Hyderabad, as one of the news articles described it3. It is a place where you can experience the Rastafari spirit of peace, love, and harmony, and enjoy the music, food, and drinks that celebrate the diversity and richness of the Caribbean culture. Cafe Raasta is a place where you can feel the vibes and have a good time.

title: yeti
name: Yeti
location: 28 A, Second Floor, Hauz Khas Village
shortDescription: Cafe Yeti is a Himalayan-themed restaurant that brings the flavors and culture of the mountainous region to the city.
description: Cafe Yeti is a Himalayan-themed restaurant that brings the flavors and culture of the mountainous region to the city. The cafe is named after the mythical creature that is said to inhabit the Himalayas, also known as the abominable snowman. The cafe’s logo features a cute and friendly version of the Yeti, inviting the customers to explore the hidden gems of the Himalayan cuisine.

The menu at cafe Yeti is a blend of dishes from Nepal, Tibet, Bhutan, and North India, such as momos, thukpa, shapta, gyathuk, tingmo, and more. The cafe also offers a variety of vegetarian and vegan options, as well as gluten-free and dairy-free choices. Some of the signature dishes at cafe Yeti are the Yeti platter, which includes a selection of momos, pakoras, and salads, the Yeti thali, which consists of rice, dal, curry, pickle, and papad, and the Yeti special, which is a spicy and tangy chicken curry with steamed rice12. The cafe also serves a range of beverages, such as masala tea, butter tea, hot chocolate, and lassi

Cafe Yeti is not just a place to enjoy delicious food, but also a place to experience the Himalayan culture and lifestyle. The cafe’s decor reflects the natural beauty and diversity of the Himalayas, with wooden furniture, colorful cushions, prayer flags, and paintings of the mountains. The cafe also plays soothing and uplifting music from the region, such as folk songs, chants, and instrumental tunes. The cafe also hosts cultural events, such as book readings, poetry sessions, film screenings, and live performances by local artists

Cafe Yeti is a place where you can escape the hustle and bustle of the city and immerse yourself in the serene and spiritual atmosphere of the Himalayas. It is a place where you can savor the authentic and exotic flavors of the Himalayan cuisine and learn more about the history and traditions of the people who live there. Cafe Yeti is a place where you can find your inner Yeti and have a memorable time.

description: Cafe Matchbox is a trendy and lively cafe and pub in Hauz Khas Village, New Delhi. The cafe is named after the small and colorful boxes that contain matches, symbolizing the spark and energy that the cafe aims to create. Cafe Matchbox is not just a place to dine and drink, but also a place to enjoy music and entertainment. The cafe hosts live DJ nights, karaoke sessions, and live bands that play rock, pop, hip hop, and other genres of music. The cafe also has a rooftop seating area that offers a stunning view of the Hauz Khas lake and the historical monuments. Cafe Matchbox is a place where you can experience the matchless vibe and atmosphere of Hauz Khas Village, as one of the travel articles described it3. It is a place where you can indulge in delicious food and drinks, and groove to the music and beats that match your mood. Cafe Matchbox is a place where you can ignite your senses and have a blast.

title: kunzum-travel-cafe
name: Kunzum Travel Cafe
shortDescription: Cafe Kunzum Travel Cafe is a unique and cozy cafe that caters to travelers, artists, and creative professionals.
description: Cafe Kunzum Travel Cafe is a unique and cozy cafe that caters to travelers, artists, and creative professionals. The cafe is located in the trendy Hauz Khas Village in New Delhi, and is named after the Kunzum Pass, a high-altitude mountain pass in the Himalayas. The cafe’s founder, Ajay Jain, is a travel writer and photographer who decided to create a space where people can share their travel stories, experiences, and tips.

The cafe offers free wi-fi, a library of travel books and magazines, and a gallery of travel photographs. The cafe also serves fine coffees, teas, and cookies, and guests can pay as much as they want to - there is no fixed price or obligation to buy anything. The cafe also hosts various events, such as book readings, film screenings, poetry sessions, music gigs, and art workshops. The cafe is open from Tuesday to Sunday, from 11 a.m. to 7:30 p.m., and is closed on Mondays

Cafe Kunzum Travel Cafe is a place where you can meet like-minded people, exchange ideas, and get inspired by the beauty and diversity of the world. It is a place where you can escape the hustle and bustle of the city and immerse yourself in the serene and spiritual atmosphere of the Himalayas. It is a place where you can find your inner traveler and have a memorable time.

title: coast-cafe
name: Coast Cafe
location: H-2, Second Floor & Third Floor, Above Ogaan, Hauz Khas Village
shortDescription: Coast Cafe is a fine dining outlet located in Hauz Khas Village, New Delhi. It offers a unique dining experience with a variety of delicious dishes prepared with fresh ingredients.
description: Coast Cafe is a fine dining outlet located in Hauz Khas Village, New Delhi. It offers a unique dining experience with a variety of delicious dishes prepared with fresh ingredients. The menu features a range of international cuisines, from Mediterranean to Asian, as well as authentic coastal delicacies from Kerala and Goa.

The cafe has a contemporary and elegant ambience, with a spacious seating area and a terrace overlooking the lake. The decor is minimalist and chic, with white walls, wooden furniture, and colorful cushions. The cafe also has a boutique store, Ogaan, on the ground floor, where customers can shop for designer clothes and accessories.

Coast Cafe is known for its impeccable service and hospitality. The staff is friendly, attentive, and professional, and always ready to assist the customers with their orders and preferences. The manager, Rajinder, is especially helpful and makes the customers feel at home. The cafe also hosts live music events and art exhibitions on weekends, adding to the lively and vibrant atmosphere.

Some of the must-try dishes at Coast Cafe are the prawn moilee, a creamy coconut-based curry with succulent prawns, served with appam, a soft and fluffy rice pancake; the veg tacos, crispy tortillas stuffed with spicy vegetables and cheese, topped with salsa and sour cream; and the sundal, a tangy and crunchy salad made with chickpeas, coconut, and curry leaves. The cafe also serves a variety of beverages, such as smoothies, juices, teas, and coffees, as well as desserts, such as cakes, pies, and ice creams.

Coast Cafe is a perfect place to enjoy a leisurely meal with family or friends, or to have a romantic date with a stunning view of the lake. It is open from 11 am to 11 pm, and accepts online reservations through Zomato and Dineout. The average cost for two people is around Rs. 1500, excluding taxes and charges. Coast Cafe is rated 4.5 out of 5 on Tripadvisor, and has received rave reviews from customers for its food, service, value, and atmosphere. It is one of the best restaurants in Delhi, and a must-visit for anyone who loves coastal cuisine and culture.

Gypsy Cafe is a great spot to hang out with friends, have a romantic date, or work on your laptop. The cafe has a vibe of peace and tranquility, and attracts a young and creative crowd. Gypsy Cafe is one of the best cafes in Hauz Khas Village, and a must-visit for anyone who loves good food, good music, and good ambiance. title: the-tea-room

shortDescription: The Tea Room is a quaint and elegant cafe located in Hauz Khas Village, New Delhi. It is a part of Blossom Kochhar, a renowned spa and aromatherapy brand.
description: The Tea Room is a quaint and elegant cafe located in Hauz Khas Village, New Delhi. It is a part of Blossom Kochhar, a renowned spa and aromatherapy brand. The cafe offers a serene and soothing ambiance, with a view of the lake and the deer park. The cafe has a vintage and classy decor, with wooden furniture, floral curtains, and antique crockery.

The cafe also serves breakfast, lunch, brunch, and snacks, with dishes such as scones, pancakes, sandwiches, salads, and pastas. The cafe specializes in organic and healthy food, using fresh and natural ingredients. Some of the popular items are the white tea, the ginger tea, the masala chai, and the hot chocolate

The Tea Room is a great place to relax, rejuvenate, and indulge in some self-care.
